section.title: sps-ig-comsvc-1_dynamic.policy
section.codeblock:
{ "ecd82da4-9df2-4f47-a294-50dd7c054fe6_dynamic.policy": { "192.168.3.183": { "group_level_backup_list": [], "backuplist": [ "/tmp/sdc_backup/", # Does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/etc/fstab", # Does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/etc/td-agent/plugin", # /etc/td-agent/plugin/ dir is empty in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/etc/confd/conf.d/logrotate_conf", # /etc/confd does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/etc/confd/templates/logrotate_conf", # /etc/confd does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/etc/kafka/", # Does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/ChargingCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/PCRFCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/RSCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/RuleAttributeDictionary.xsl", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/peertimeout.properties", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/rule/VsaToContextMapping.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/rule/ChargingVsaToContextMapping.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/vsa/*.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/vsa/dra/CustomAttributeImplementersTemplate.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/TACData.dsv", "/appdata/LCM/sysdata/", # /appdata does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 "/appdata/LCM/fstab" # /appdata does not exist in provisioning, Kf-sps-0 ], "excludelist": [] }, "schedule": [] } }
# Kf-sps-0 pod has none of the files
